Class 3

View On Github Download class file

Html -> hyper text markup language

basic block

<html>
  <head>
    <!-- meta information -->
  </head>
  <body>

  </body>
</html>

Tag

  • html
  • head
  • title
  • h1 to h6
  • p
  • ul
  • ol
  • li
  • a
  • img
  • b / strong
  • i
  • br
  • hr
  • u

Attribute

  • href // its a a anchor attribute
  • src // source attribute for img tag
  • alt // alternative text attribute for img tag
